00206 class request
00207 {
00208     friend int wait_any(request_ptr req_array[], int count);
00209     template <class request_iterator_> friend
00210     request_iterator_ wait_any(request_iterator_ reqs_begin, request_iterator_ reqs_end);
00211     friend class file;
00212     friend class disk_queue;
00213     friend class disk_queues;
00214     friend class request_ptr;
00215 
00216 protected:
00217     virtual bool add_waiter (onoff_switch * sw) = 0;
00218     virtual void delete_waiter (onoff_switch * sw) = 0;
00219     //virtual void enqueue () = 0;
00220     virtual void serve () = 0;
00221     //virtual unsigned size() const;
00222 
00223     completion_handler on_complete;
00224     int ref_cnt;
00225     std::auto_ptr<stxxl::io_error> error;
00226 
00227 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00228     boost::mutex ref_cnt_mutex;
00229 #else
00230     mutex ref_cnt_mutex;
00231 #endif
00232 
00233 public:
00234     enum request_type { READ, WRITE };
00235 
00236 protected:
00237     file * file_;
00238     void * buffer;
00239     stxxl::int64 offset;
00240     size_t bytes;
00241     request_type type;
00242 
00243     void completed ()
00244     {
00245         on_complete(this);
00246     }
00247 
00248     // returns number of references
00249     int nref()
00250     {
00251 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00252         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(ref_cnt_mutex);
00253         return ref_cnt;
00254 #else
00255         ref_cnt_mutex.lock();
00256         int ref_cnt_ = ref_cnt;
00257         ref_cnt_mutex.unlock();
00258         return ref_cnt_;
00259 #endif
00260     }
00261 
00262 public:
00263     request(        completion_handler on_compl,
00264                     file * file__,
00265                     void * buffer_,
00266                     stxxl::int64 offset_,
00267                     size_t bytes_,
00268                     request_type type_) :
00269         on_complete(on_compl), ref_cnt(0),
00270         file_(file__),
00271         buffer(buffer_),
00272         offset(offset_),
00273         bytes(bytes_),
00274         type(type_)
00275     {
00276         STXXL_VERBOSE3("request " << unsigned (this) << ": creation, cnt: " << ref_cnt);
00277     }
00279     virtual void wait () = 0;
00282     virtual bool poll () = 0;
00285     virtual const char * io_type ()
00286     {
00287         return "none";
00288     }
00289     virtual ~request()
00290     {
00291         STXXL_VERBOSE3("request " << unsigned (this) << ": deletion, cnt: " << ref_cnt);
00292     }
00293     file * get_file() const { return file_; }
00294     void * get_buffer() const { return buffer; }
00295     stxxl::int64 get_offset() const { return offset; }
00296     size_t get_size() const { return bytes; }
00297     size_t size() const { return bytes; }
00298     request_type get_type() const { return type; }
00299 
00300     virtual std::ostream & print(std::ostream & out) const
00301     {
00302         out << "File object address: " << (void *)get_file();
00303         out << " Bufffer address: " << (void *)get_buffer();
00304         out << " File offset: " << get_offset();
00305         out << " Transfer size: " << get_size() << " bytes";
00306         out << " Type of transfer: " << ((get_type() == READ) ? "READ" : "WRITE");
00307         return out;
00308     }
00309 
00312     void error_occured(const char * msg)
00313     {
00314         error.reset(new stxxl::io_error(msg));
00315     }
00316 
00319     void error_occured(const std::string & msg)
00320     {
00321         error.reset(new stxxl::io_error(msg));
00322     }
00323 
00325     void check_errors() throw (stxxl::io_error)
00326     {
00327         if (error.get())
00328             throw * (error.get());
00329     }
00330 
00331 private:
00332     // Following methods are declared but not implemented
00333     // intentionnaly to forbid their usage
00334     request(const request &);
00335     request & operator=(const request &);
00336     request();
00337 
00338     void add_ref()
00339     {
00340 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00341         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(ref_cnt_mutex);
00342         ref_cnt++;
00343         STXXL_VERBOSE3("request add_ref() " << unsigned (this) << ": adding reference, cnt: " << ref_cnt);
00344 
00345 #else
00346         ref_cnt_mutex.lock();
00347         ref_cnt++;
00348         STXXL_VERBOSE3("request add_ref() " << unsigned (this) << ": adding reference, cnt: " << ref_cnt);
00349         ref_cnt_mutex.unlock();
00350 #endif
00351     }
00352     bool sub_ref()
00353     {
00354 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00355         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(ref_cnt_mutex);
00356         int val = --ref_cnt;
00357         STXXL_VERBOSE3("request sub_ref() " << unsigned (this) << ": subtracting reference cnt: " << ref_cnt);
00358         Lock.unlock();
00359 
00360 #else
00361         ref_cnt_mutex.lock();
00362         int val = --ref_cnt;
00363         STXXL_VERBOSE3("request sub_ref() " << unsigned (this) << ": subtracting reference cnt: " << ref_cnt);
00364 
00365         ref_cnt_mutex.unlock();
00366 #endif
00367         assert(val >= 0);
00368         return (val == 0);
00369     }
00370 };
00371 
00372 inline std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & out, const request & req)
00373 {
00374     return req.print(out);
00375 }

00380 class request_ptr
00381 {
00382     request * ptr;
00383     void add_ref()
00384     {
00385         if (ptr)
00386         {
00387             ptr->add_ref();
00388         }
00389     }
00390     void sub_ref()
00391     {
00392         if (ptr)
00393         {
00394             if (ptr->sub_ref())
00395             {
00396                 STXXL_VERBOSE3("the last copy " << unsigned (ptr) << " this=" << unsigned (this));
00397                 delete ptr;
00398                 ptr = NULL;
00399             }
00400             else
00401             {
00402                 STXXL_VERBOSE3("more copies " << unsigned (ptr) << " this=" << unsigned (this));
00403             }
00404         }
00405     }
00406 public:
00408     request_ptr(request * ptr_ = NULL) : ptr(ptr_)
00409     {
00410         STXXL_VERBOSE3("create constructor (request =" << unsigned (ptr) << ") this=" << unsigned (this));
00411         add_ref();
00412     }
00414     request_ptr(const request_ptr & p) : ptr(p.ptr)
00415     {
00416         STXXL_VERBOSE3("copy constructor (copying " << unsigned (ptr) << ") this=" << unsigned (this));
00417         add_ref();
00418     }
00420     ~request_ptr()
00421     {
00422         STXXL_VERBOSE3("Destructor of a request_ptr pointing to " << unsigned (ptr) << " this=" << unsigned (this));
00423         sub_ref();
00424     }
00427     request_ptr & operator= (const request_ptr & p)
00428     {
00429         // assert(p.ptr);
00430         return (*this = p.ptr);
00431     }
00434     request_ptr & operator= (request * p)
00435     {
00436         STXXL_VERBOSE3("assign operator begin (assigning " << unsigned (p) << ") this=" << unsigned (this));
00437         if (p != ptr)
00438         {
00439             sub_ref();
00440             ptr = p;
00441             add_ref();
00442         }
00443         STXXL_VERBOSE3("assign operator end (assigning " << unsigned (p) << ") this=" << unsigned (this));
00444         return *this;
00445     }
00448     request & operator * () const
00449     {
00450         assert(ptr);
00451         return *ptr;
00452     }
00455     request * operator -> () const
00456     {
00457         assert(ptr);
00458         return ptr;
00459     }
00464     request * get() const { return ptr; }
00465 
00467     bool valid() const { return ptr; }
00468 
00470     bool empty() const { return !ptr; }
00471 };

00479 inline int wait_any(request_ptr req_array[], int count);
00483 inline void wait_all(request_ptr req_array[], int count);
00489 inline bool poll_any (request_ptr req_array[], int count, int &index);
00490 
00491 
00492 void wait_all(request_ptr req_array[], int count)
00493 {
00494     for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
00495     {
00496         req_array[i]->wait ();
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00500 template <class request_iterator_>
00501 void wait_all(request_iterator_ reqs_begin, request_iterator_ reqs_end)
00502 {
00503     while (reqs_begin != reqs_end)
00504     {
00505         (request_ptr(*reqs_begin))->wait ();
00506         ++reqs_begin;
00507     }
00508 }
00509 
00510 bool poll_any (request_ptr req_array[], int count, int &index)
00511 {
00512     index = -1;
00513     for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
00514     {
00515         if (req_array[i]->poll())
00516         {
00517             index = i;
00518             return true;
00519         }
00520     }
00521     return false;
00522 }
00523 
00524 template <class request_iterator_>
00525 request_iterator_ poll_any(request_iterator_ reqs_begin, request_iterator_ reqs_end)
00526 {
00527     while (reqs_begin != reqs_end)
00528     {
00529         if ((request_ptr(*reqs_begin))->poll())
00530             return reqs_begin;
00531 
00532         ++reqs_begin;
00533     }
00534     return reqs_end;
00535 }
00536 
00537 
00538 int wait_any (request_ptr req_array[], int count)
00539 {
00540     START_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00541     onoff_switch sw;
00542     int i = 0, index = -1;
00543 
00544     for ( ; i < count; i++)
00545     {
00546         if (req_array[i]->add_waiter (&sw))
00547         {
00548             // already done
00549             index = i;
00550 
00551             while (--i >= 0)
00552                 req_array[i]->delete_waiter (&sw);
00553 
00554 
00555             END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00556 
00557             req_array[index]->check_errors();
00558 
00559             return index;
00560         }
00561     }
00562 
00563     sw.wait_for_on ();
00564 
00565     for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00566     {
00567         req_array[i]->delete_waiter (&sw);
00568         if (index < 0 && req_array[i]->poll ())
00569             index = i;
00570     }
00571 
00572     END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00573     return index;
00574 }
00575 
00576 template <class request_iterator_>
00577 request_iterator_ wait_any(request_iterator_ reqs_begin, request_iterator_ reqs_end)
00578 {
00579     START_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00580     onoff_switch sw;
00581 
00582     request_iterator_ cur = reqs_begin, result = reqs_end;
00583 
00584     for ( ; cur != reqs_end; cur++)
00585     {
00586         if ((request_ptr(*cur))->add_waiter (&sw))
00587         {
00588             // already done
00589             result = cur;
00590 
00591             if (cur != reqs_begin)
00592             {
00593                 while (--cur != reqs_begin)
00594                     (request_ptr(*cur))->delete_waiter (&sw);
00595 
00596                 (request_ptr(*cur))->delete_waiter (&sw);
00597             }
00598 
00599             END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00600 
00601             (request_ptr(*result))->check_errors();
00602 
00603             return result;
00604         }
00605     }
00606 
00607     sw.wait_for_on ();
00608 
00609     for (cur = reqs_begin; cur != reqs_end; cur++)
00610     {
00611         (request_ptr(*cur))->delete_waiter (&sw);
00612         if (result == reqs_end && (request_ptr(*cur))->poll ())
00613             result = cur;
00614     }
00615 
00616     END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00617     return result;
00618 }

00620 class disk_queue
00621 {
00622 public:
00623     enum priority_op { READ, WRITE, NONE };
00624 private:
00625 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00626     boost::mutex write_mutex;
00627     boost::mutex read_mutex;
00628 #else
00629     mutex write_mutex;
00630     mutex read_mutex;
00631 #endif
00632     std::queue < request_ptr > write_queue;
00633     std::queue < request_ptr > read_queue;
00634 
00635     semaphore sem;
00636 
00637     priority_op _priority_op;
00638 
00639 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00640     boost::thread thread;
00641 #else
00642     pthread_t thread;
00643 #endif
00644 
00645 
00646 #ifdef STXXL_IO_STATS
00647     stats * iostats;
00648 #endif
00649 
00650     static void * worker (void * arg);
00651 public:
00652     disk_queue (int n = 1);             // max number of requests simultainenously submitted to disk
00653 
00654     void set_priority_op (priority_op op)
00655     {
00656         _priority_op = op;
00657     }
00658     void add_readreq (request_ptr & req);
00659     void add_writereq (request_ptr & req);
00660     ~disk_queue ();
00661 };
00662 
00665 class disk_queues
00666 {
00667 protected:
00668     std::map < DISKID, disk_queue * > queues;
00669     disk_queues () { }
00670 public:
00671     void add_readreq (request_ptr & req, DISKID disk)
00672     {
00673         if (queues.find (disk) == queues.end ())
00674         {
00675             // create new disk queue
00676             queues[disk] = new disk_queue ();
00677         }
00678         queues[disk]->add_readreq (req);
00679     }
00680     void add_writereq (request_ptr & req, DISKID disk)
00681     {
00682         if (queues.find (disk) == queues.end ())
00683         {
00684             // create new disk queue
00685             queues[disk] = new disk_queue ();
00686         }
00687         queues[disk]->add_writereq (req);
00688     }
00689     ~disk_queues ()
00690     {
00691         // deallocate all queues
00692         for (std::map < DISKID, disk_queue * > ::iterator i =
00693                  queues.begin (); i != queues.end (); i++)
00694             delete (*i).second;
00695     };
00696     static disk_queues * get_instance ()
00697     {
00698         if (!instance)
00699             instance = new disk_queues ();
00700 
00701 
00702         return instance;
00703     }
00709     void set_priority_op(disk_queue::priority_op op)
00710     {
00711         for (std::map < DISKID, disk_queue * > ::iterator i =
00712                  queues.begin (); i != queues.end (); i++)
00713             i->second->set_priority_op (op);
00714     }
00715 private:
00716     static disk_queues * instance;
00717 };
